gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਚਲਿ ਜਾੲੇ ਸਿਖ ਤਾ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਜਗਤੁ ਚਲਿ ਅਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Satigur Charan Sarani Chali Jaaay Sikha , Taa Charan Sarani Jagatu Chali Aavaee ?
translation: A Sikh who devotedly goes to the refuge of a True Guru, has the whole world falling at his feet.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਅਾਗਿਅਾ ਸਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਮਾਨੈ ਸਿਖ ਅਾਗਿਅਾ ਤਾਹਿ ਸਕਲ ਸੰਸਾਰਹਿ ਹਿਤਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Satigur Aagiaa Sati Sati Kari Maanai Sikha , Aagiaa Taahi Sakal Sansaarahi Hitaavaee ?
translation: A Sikh of the Guru who abides by the command of his Guru, accepting it to be true; his command is loved by the whole world.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸੇਵਾ ਭਾੲਿ ਪ੍ਰਾਨ ਪੂਜਾ ਕਰੈ ਸਿਖ ਸਰਬ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਅਗ੍ਰਭਾਗਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਾਵੲੀ
transliteration: Satigur Sayvaa Bhaai Praan Poojaa Karai Sikha , Sarab Nidhaan Agrabhaagi Liv Laavaee ?
translation: A Sikh of the Guru who serves his Guru with loving devotion at the cost of his life considering such service as worship, all the treasures are mute attendant before him.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸੀਖਿਅਾ ਦੀਖਿਅਾ ਹਿਰਦੇ ਪ੍ਵੇਸ ਜਾਹਿ ਤਾ ਕੀ ਸੀਖ ਸੁਨਤ ਪਰਮਪਦ ਪਾਵੲੀ ॥੮੭॥
transliteration: Satigur Seekhiaa Deekhiaa Hiraday Pravays Jaahi , Taa Kee Seekh Sounat Paramapad Paavaee ?87?
translation: A Sikh of the Guru who has the teachings and consecration of his Guru in his heart, listening to his teachings/sermons one can reach supreme spiritual state. (87)
